Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/major delays and congestion following an earlier minor track fire at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/major delays and congestion following an earlier minor track fire at Cicero.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.  Bus shuttle service is available to provide connecting service from Forest Park to UIC-Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
